channel.title: What happened here
channel.description:
i came to this site expecting the wonderful environment i left, full of intelligence and honest discussions about relevant topics, a pursuit of knowledge, and a focused goal of little yellow pixels.
I'm sorely disappointed, what happened to you guys ? I've clicked on several topics that basically say how you've given up on life, jagex sucks, lets riot and so forth.
can someone please tell me what happened to everyone? i left when the sun was shining on all of us, i come back and were all in the dark.

item.title: What happened here
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:18, topic:164504”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=223350.msg1930161#msg1930161 date=1197659354]

Personally, who cares about Runescape?

Obviously most of this community, because thats all i have seen lately. These faggots crying over a game.
I, of course blame the parents. :rolleyes:
[/quote]

parents bought gold for their kids lol[/quote]
i thought it was for complants how mad their parents got to see there kid cry over a game once they died in the wild.

Read full topic

item.title: What happened here
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“sidishere, post:7, topic:164504”]dont like it? leave.
and jagex have gone too far trying to stop gold farming.[/quote]
They should take a page from Blizzard. Just keep banning not really care to make it impossible.
This method doesn’t ruin it for everyone else.

Could you imagine WoW having this unfair trade system thing. WoW would die.

Read full topic

item.title: What happened here
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Renax:

this is an interesting decision they made, but i wish everyone could handle it with alittle more grace.

The problem is, update after update they’ve been going down hill, I thought the Grand Exchange was good, but others did not, now we cannot trade unfairly, we cannot lend friends items etc, pretty soon they’ll start banning random accounts in hopes runescape will be ruined enough for people to move over to mechscape.

sidishere:

dont like it? leave.

I’m not sure you know this, but this isn’t a sole cheating forum, we have a little thing called “private” servers here.

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Renax:

i come back and were all in the dark.

Because jagex have fucked up runescape. For members, trading unfairly, by 3k difference will be removed. Jagex have removed wildy, so it means you cannot sell/buy gold any more.
